subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Joe Pavelski had a goal and two assists, Joe Thornton added timely goal, and the San Jose Sharks won back-to-back games for the second time in nearly four weeks, beating the Dallas Stars, 5-2, at home.sharks.
snippet: Joe Pavelski had a goal and two assists, Joe Thornton added timely goal, and the San Jose Sharks won back-to-back games for the second time in nearly four weeks, beating the Dallas Stars, 5-2, at home.sharks.
